task.title: Step 4. Create and Configure a StreamSets Service

context.p: Cloudera Managercreating a StreamSets serviceAfter you install the StreamSets CSD, create and configure a StreamSets service. When you configure the service, you assign the to the hosts where you want it to run.
context.note: To run the in cluster mode, colocate the Data Collector role with a Spark Streaming Gateway.
context.p: When working with multiple clusters, perform the following steps for each cluster.

step.cmd: In Cloudera Manager, click the menu for the cluster you want to use, then click Add a Service.
In the Service Types list, select StreamSets, then click Continue.
To select the hosts where you want to install StreamSets, on the Customize Role Assignments for StreamSets page, click Select Hosts to open a list of available hosts.
Select one or more hosts, then click OK. Click Continue.
step.info: The Review Changes page displays the Data and Resource directories for the .

step.cmd: Optionally change the directories, then click Continue.
step.info: The First Run Command page displays status updates as Cloudera Manager starts the on the selected hosts. If necessary, you can abort starting the .
